subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The joint bid by Belgium and the Netherlands was the first accepted for the 2018 World Cup, the FIFA president, Joseph S. Blatter, said.The 2018 host will be selected at an executive committee meeting in 2011 with the United States, Mexico, Japan, China, Russia, Spain-Portugal, England and Australia all interested, according to Blatter.South Africa will be the host in 2010, and Brazil will be the host in 2014.
